sections.text: Embezzlement, generally. Obtaining valuable thing or service by false pretenses. Fraudulent issue of checks or drafts. Procuring property or credit by false statement. Fraudulent warehouse receipts. Defrauding of public communi

sections.heading: to 53-376. - Defrauding keeper of hotel, restaurant or boarding house
sections.text: Evasion of fares. Fraudulent issue and use of transfer ticket upon public conveyance. False statement by hirer of horse; by hirer of boat. Conversion of money by court officer.
